game.name: The joyless joybound
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Dive into a captivating visual novel blending modern city life with Eastern fantasy! You are the chosen heir to the renowned Hehuan Sect, a powerful cultivation clan. This summer break, your destiny awaits: charm your way into the hearts of enchanting young heroines and forge your romantic path.
